biotools.summary: Server which provides cluster tree diagrams of a protein based on the charged atoms or hydrophobicity of each of its residues.  The diagram allows for visual inspection of the distribution of hydrophobic and charged regions in proteins.

bioschemas.name: Qgrid
bioschemas.summary: Server which provides cluster tree diagrams of a protein based on the charged atoms or hydrophobicity of each of its residues.  The diagram allows for visual inspection of the distribution of hydrophobic and charged regions in proteins.
